last_episode_to_air.name: The After Life
last_episode_to_air.overview: Family tensions are high when Kalief's estranged father tries to take over the case and settlement negotiation. Kalief's mother, Venida, fights depression and bad health but suffers a massive heart attack, dying at the hospital.

name: Time: The Kalief Browder Story
overview: The story of a teenager wrongfully charged with theft and jailed at Riker's Island prison for over 1,000 days.

episodes.name: The System
episodes.overview: Kalief Browder seeks justice from New York City for his wrongful arrest and three year imprisonment at Rikers Island; Kalief's deposition proves to be treacherous and he is forced to answer questions about his troubled past.

episodes.name: The Island
episodes.overview: A look at the early days of Kalief's incarceration at Rikers Island, where he is introduced to a world of violence, corruption and gangs, forcing him to defend himself from other inmates and corrections officers

guest_stars.character: Self (Former Commissioner, NYC Department of Corrections)
guest_stars.name: Florence Finkle

guest_stars.character: Self (former Commissioner, NYC Department of Corrections)
guest_stars.name: Dora Schriro

episodes.name: The Bing
episodes.overview: Kalief refuses to plead guilty, demanding a trial. He is caught in the revolving door of solitary confinement as his case crawls through a stagnant court system.

guest_stars.character: Self (former Executive Director of Mental Health)
guest_stars.name: Daniel Selling

episodes.name: The Witness
episodes.overview: After a delay in the case a missing witness is found, revealing sloppy detective work. Kalief is faced with time served but refuses to plead guilty to a crime he didn't commit. He is released a month later without explanation.

guest_stars.character: Self (former Executive Director of Mental Health)
guest_stars.name: Daniel Selling

episodes.name: Injustice For All
episodes.overview: Kalief becomes a folk hero and the poster child of a broken system, attracting journalists and celebrities as he fights for justice, but he begins to deteriorate under the bright spotlight of the media.

episodes.name: The After Life
episodes.overview: Family tensions are high when Kalief's estranged father tries to take over the case and settlement negotiation. Kalief's mother, Venida, fights depression and bad health but suffers a massive heart attack, dying at the hospital.
